TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以處理事件來提供自訂排序。You can handle the event to provide custom sorting. 只會發生此事件時未設定屬性和屬性設定為`false`。This event occurs only when the property is not set and the property is set to `false`. 每一對排序的資料行中的資料格的一次發生此事件。This event occurs once for each pair of cells in the column being sorted. 只有當使用者按一下資料行的標頭時，才發生屬性值，或當您呼叫多載。It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a property value of , or when you call the overload. 當此事件發生時的資料行屬性值，您必須顯示排序圖像 （glyph） 自行透過屬性。When this event occurs for a column with a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 您可以使用這個事件來排序資料列或多個資料行中有一個資料行使用資料格的值。You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns. 使用並屬性，以比較儲存格的值，指定在資料行中屬性。Use the and properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the property. 使用並屬性來存取其他資料行中的值集合。Use the and properties to access values in other columns through the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用在多個資料行排序。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/VB/form1.vb#10)]

related.span: 如何：自訂 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項的排序

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As DataGridViewColumn

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得正在排序的資料行。

span.span: Gets the column being sorted.
The to sort.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是用於決定及控制以程式設計方式排序的排序行為。This property is useful in determining and controlling sort behavior in programmatic sorts. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用在多個資料行排序。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 在此範例中的識別碼資料行用來決定最終的順序，如果相同的值中的已排序的資料行，因此會進行任何額外的排序，如果識別碼資料行中有重複的值。In this example the ID column is used to determine the final order if there are identical values in the sorted column, so no additional sorting will be done if there are duplicate values in the ID column. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/VB/form1.vb#10)]

related.span: 如何：自訂 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項的排序

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SortResult { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SortResult : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示比較的儲存格將要排序的次序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the order in which the compared cells will be sorted.

value.span: 如果第一個儲存格將排序在第二個儲存格之前，則會小於零；如果第一個儲存格和第二個儲存格有相同的值，則為零；如果第二個儲存格將排序在第一個儲存格之前，則為大於零。

span.span: Less than zero if the first cell will be sorted before the second cell; zero if the first cell and second cell have equivalent values; greater than zero if the second cell will be sorted before the first cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此值通常是您將執行中的處理常式的最後一個作業事件。Setting this value is typically the last operation you will perform in a handler for the event. 您會通常設定此值的比較方法的傳回值到例如。You will typically set this value to the return value of a comparison method such as . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用在多個資料行排序。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
